headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. Announces Second Quarter Results
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., May 02, 2025--Franklin Resources, Inc. (the "Company") [NYSE: BEN] today announced net income1 of $151.4 million or $0.26 per diluted share for the quarter ended March 31, 2025, as compared to $163.6 million or $0.29 per diluted share for the previous quarter, and $124.2 million or $0.23 per diluted share for the quarter ended March 31, 2024.
